review: as expected and arrived on time
author: Nilo C. Cruz "nilo cruz"

review: What's not to say about AppleTV. If you have an iPhone, iPad or any Apple computer product, you should have an AppleTV. We ditched cable and use our AppleTV nearly exclusively. We also use our Playstation3 on occasion. This one we bought as a wedding gift and they love it. Everyone should have one in their home. We love streaming our PhotoStream pics on it when we have guest over. It's the easiest way to get your photos up and displayed.
author: Craig G "CG"

review: Works good except that we haven't had it for a full year yet and the menu button on the remote isn't working properly.
author: Theresa Beasley

review: sisters have not complained about this xmas gift
author: Christopher A. Peters

review: Excellent Apple Quality.  Amazon and Roku have probably surpassed them in features at this point, but if you are comfortable in the Apple Eco-System, this might be the way to go.  Built well, and just works.  Not a speed demon, but gets the job done.  Can't wait tp see the next iteration.
author: Delana Patnode

review: Does everything expected. Worth the buy
author: Kbo

review: Great product, perhaps becoming a bit outdated. I understand why there is no Amazon Prime app, but how about a native Plex.  I use PlexConnect, but it is a pain.  Out of my streaming devices, it's the one I use the most.  I own Chromecast, FireTV and Roku.
author: M. Walker
